Method Detail

resolvedPropertyValues

Properties resolvedPropertyValues(Properties properties,
                                  boolean trimValues)
Replaces all placeholders of format ${name} with the corresponding property from the supplied Properties. All entries in the properties map are visited on by one to resolve any placeholders from within the properties object.

Parameters:
properties - the Properties to use for replacement, and also the properties for which we loop around and resolve.
Returns:
the supplied value with placeholders replaced inline.

resolvedPropertyValues

Properties resolvedPropertyValues(Properties properties)

resolvedPropertyValues

Map<String,String> resolvedPropertyValues(Map<String,String> properties,
                                          boolean trimValues)
Replaces all placeholders of format ${name} with the corresponding property from the supplied Map. All entries in the Map map are visited on by one to resolve any placeholders from within the same Map object.

Parameters:
properties - the Map to use for replacement, and also the properties for which we loop around and resolve.
Returns:
the supplied value with placeholders replaced inline.

resolvedPropertyValues

Map<String,String> resolvedPropertyValues(Map<String,String> properties)

resolvedPropertyValue

String resolvedPropertyValue(Properties properties,
                             String key,
                             boolean trimValues)
Replaces all placeholders of format ${name} with the value returned from the supplied Properties object.

Parameters:
key - the entry within the given Properties object; for which we which to replace any placeholder that exist in the value; from the set of other properties contained within the given Properties object.
properties - the Properties to use as the source of the placeholders replacements
Returns:
the supplied value with placeholders replaced inline.

resolvedPropertyValue

String resolvedPropertyValue(Properties properties,
                             String key)

resolvedPropertyValue

String resolvedPropertyValue(Map<String,String> map,
                             String key,
                             boolean trimValues)
Replaces all placeholders of format ${name} with the value returned from the supplied Map object.

Parameters:
key - the entry within the given Map object; for which we which to replace any placeholder that exist in the value. The replacement is taken from the set of other key/value pairs also contained within the given Map object.
map - the Map to use as the source of the placeholders replacements
Returns:
the supplied value with placeholders replaced inline.

resolvedPropertyValue

String resolvedPropertyValue(Map<String,String> map,
                             String key)
